text:
No doubt Zayn was the best singer of one direction because he seems to be master of false note I.e. high note.

Earlier almost in every song Zayn was there as back up or the one whome we could hear for a long time plus he got paras equal to Harry (except in midnight memories)

Now talking about the four

Harry styles is at the top who too has capacity and capability to Sing at high notes for eg. In best song ever and in drag me down

He do his job with greater effort than Zayn because for Zayn it is easier

So in effort Haary is at top

And as whole Zayn is at top.

Now talking about liam

He has a manly voice as said in an answer

But he loves doing experiment for eg. In kiss you where he too tries high note like Zayn he is at 2 nd according to me(in 4)

Now talking about Louis

Louis has voice one of a kind,he has rather sweet voice which seems to be cracked and has gifted high scale capability.

So I would rate him 3rd

Now about Niall

Niall has an average voice which most of the population who sing can reach upto but Niall has excellent guitar skills but his singing is not upto the mark so I would mark him 4th

Hope my opinion would be helpful
title: Who is the best singer in One Direction?
